Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Yuletide \Yule"tide`\, n. Christmas time; Christmastide; the season of Christmas. [1913 Webster]
Yuletide n : period extending from Dec. 24 to Jan. 6 [syn: {Christmas}, {Christmastide}, {Christmastime}, {Yule}, {Noel}]
